scripts.py:dev: export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH" && uv run uvicorn src.app:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.py:test: export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH" && uv run pytest tests/ -v
scripts.py:lint: export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH" && uv run flake8 src/ tests/
scripts.py:lint:fix: export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH" && uv run black src/ tests/ && uv run isort src/ tests/
scripts.py:typecheck: export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH" && uv run mypy src/
